### 1. ‚ùå GOD SCORE HEALTH: **CRITICAL**

```
  ‚Ä¢ Team:      9.2  (Target: ~18)
  ‚Ä¢ Traction:  5.2  (Target: ~12)

  ‚Ä¢ Vision:    5.9  (Target: ~12)

Distribution:
  ‚Ä¢ Excellent (80-100):  0 startups (0.0%)
  ‚Ä¢ Good (60-79):       23 startups (2.3%)
  ‚Ä¢ Average (40-59):   651 startups (65.1%)
  ‚Ä¢ Below Avg (<40):   326 startups (32.6%)
```

**Impact:** 
- User experience degraded (low match quality)
- Startups appear less impressive than they are
- Matching algorithm biased toward low scores

**Root Cause:**
- GOD scoring algorithm too conservative
- Component score multipliers set too low
- Missing psychological signal multipliers

**Action Required:**
```bash
# PRIORITY 1: Recalibrate GOD scores
npx tsx scripts/recalculate-scores.ts
```
